page.title: 15HOUSING. General Description
page.content: Most housing is in and around BROCTON village though there are a few isolated cottages for farm/forestry workers. The village is based around half a dozen old buildings in the centre built in previous centuries and a few farm buildings.To the SE along Sawpit Lane are some mid 20th Century semi detached and bungalow housing.To the north there exists much of the newer houses many built since 1970.There are no estates with much of the building being small, individually designed and expensive houses in the 60/90 thousand pound price range. {MY HOUSE}.....We have gas central heating.Only three of the windows are double glazed.We dont have cavity wall insulation.We cook by electricity and have a lot of electrical appliances. Four people live in our house. (Michael Crossland Age 8)
